headline: BNY Aligns Leadership to Accelerate Growth in Wealth Solutions
summary: BNY (NYSE: BK) today announced changes to its executive leadership team to further align its businesses and advance its ambitions in the wealth solutions and managed accounts ecosystem, strengthening its ability to support advisors and institutions with more integrated capabilities across the wealth landscape.
